contextId.occurrenceNote: Jesus is describing a hypothetical situation that could have happened in the past, but it did not. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hypo]])
contextId.glQuote: If the mighty deeds ... in sackcloth and ashes

contextId.occurrenceNote: Jesus is describing a hypothetical situation that could have happened in the past, but it did not. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hypo]])
contextId.glQuote: For if in Sodom ... it would still have remained until today
